last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Garundi begins a frantic search when Balbir goes missing. Secrets, pride and the tragic cost of love intertwine in the events leading to Paul's death.

name: Kohrra
overview: When an NRI bridegroom is found dead days before his wedding in the countryside of Punjab, two cops must unravel the troubling case as turbulence unfolds in their own lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a dead body is found, cops Balbir and Garundi uncover links to a wedding and a missing foreigner. A father's grief pulls him down a rageful path.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An unfolding nightmare traps two families. As cracks grow in Garundi and Balbir's lives, unspoken yearnings emerge. Police chase down new leads.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Nimrat struggles to live under her father's roof. Happy tries to handle a suspicious deal while a brawl involving Paul and Liam sparks new questions.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A sudden confession could close the case, but lingering doubts remain. Balbir seeks companionship and family pressure pushes Garundi to take charge.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A hit-and-run — or murder? Murky details cloud the investigation. Balbir's violent interference in Nimrat's life sends her spiraling into darkness.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Garundi begins a frantic search when Balbir goes missing. Secrets, pride and the tragic cost of love intertwine in the events leading to Paul's death.
